1.name: The Searchers
1.description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

2.name: The Ten Commandments
2.description: The Egyptian Prince, Moses, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

3.name: Giant
3.description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

4.name: Forbidden Planet
4.description: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

5.name: The Bad Seed
5.description: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight-year-old daughter is a heartless killer.

6.name: Ransom!
6.description: The Stannards' son is kidnapped for ransom. Plot centres around Ford's (the father) efforts to find him.

7.name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
7.description: An American physician and his wife take matters into their own hands after assassins planning to execute a foreign Prime Minister kidnap their son.

8.name: The Killing
8.description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five man team to plan and execute a daring race-track robbery.

9.name: Moby Dick
9.description: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

10.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
10.description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

11.name: War and Peace
11.description: Napoleon's (Herbert Lom's) tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

12.name: Gaby
12.description: This is a remake of the 1931 and 1940 versions of the movie Waterloo Bridge.

13.name: Around the World in 80 Days
13.description: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

14.name: The King and I
14.description: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

15.name: Love Me Tender
15.description: At the end of the Civil War, a Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union payroll train but the war ends leaving these men with their Union loot, until the Feds come looking for it.

16.name: The Conqueror
16.description: Mongol chief Temujin battles against Tartar armies and for the love of the Tartar princess Bortai. Temujin becomes the emperor Genghis Khan.

17.name: The Last Wagon
17.description: Wagon train survivors of an Apache attack entrust the sheriff's prisoner, scout Comanche Todd, with their lives despite his wanted-for-murder status.

18.name: Picnic
18.description: Emotions are ignited amongst the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labour Day picnic.

19.name: Notre-Dame de Paris
19.description: The timeless tale of the seductive gypsy Esmeralda and the tortured hunchback Quasimodo.

20.name: Jubal
20.description: A new foreman rejects the sexual advances of a frustrated rancher's wife, which leads to conflicts that could get him killed.

21.name: Lust for Life
21.description: The life of brilliant but tortured artist Vincent van Gogh.

22.name: High Society
22.description: A spoiled heiress must choose among three suitors: her jazz musician ex-husband, a stuffy businessman, and an undercover tabloid reporter.

23.name: Doublecross
23.description: A Cornish poacher clashes with dangerous international spies.

24.name: Et Dieu... créa la femme
24.description: In sunny St. Tropez, a young sexpot loves one brother but marries the other.

25.name: The Wrong Man
25.description: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emmanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.

26.name: Anastasia
26.description: An opportunistic Russian businessman tries to pass a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia. But she is so convincing in her performance that even the biggest skeptics believe her.

27.name: The Harder They Fall
27.description: Down-on-his-luck ex-sportswriter Eddie Willis is hired by shady fight promoter Nick Benko to promote his latest find, an unknown but easily exploitable phenom from Argentina.

28.name: Somebody Up There Likes Me
28.description: Boxer Rocky Graziano's biopic, based on his autobiography, from childhood to his World Middleweight Championship title win at age 28 in 1947.

29.name: Un condamné à mort s'est échappé ou Le vent souffle où il veut
29.description: A captured French Resistance fighter during WWII engineers a daunting escape from a Nazi prison in France.

30.name: Nightfall
30.description: Through a series of bizarre coincidences, an artist finds himself falsely accused of bank robbery and murder and is pursued by the authorities and the real killers.

31.name: A Kiss Before Dying
31.description: A ruthless college student resorts to murder in a futile attempt to marry an heiress.

32.name: Baby Doll
32.description: A steamy tale of two Southern rivals and a sensuous nineteen-year-old virgin.

33.name: The Mountain
33.description: Selfish Chris Teller pressures his older brother, a retired climber, to accompany him on a treacherous Alpine climb to loot the bodies of plane crash victims.

34.name: Carousel
34.description: Fifteen years after his death, a carousel barker is granted permission to return to Earth for one day to make amends to his widow and their daughter.

35.name: Friendly Persuasion
35.description: The pacifist attitude of a Quaker family is tested as a result of the American Civil War.

36.name: The Teahouse of the August Moon
36.description: In post-WWII Japan, an American captain is brought in to help build a school, but the locals want a teahouse instead.

37.name: Three Violent People
37.description: When Confederate officer Colt Saunders returns to his Texas ranch after the war he finds his lands wanted by carpetbaggers and by corrupt provisional government commissioners Harrison and Cable.

38.description: In a totalitarian future society, Winston Smith, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

39.name: Written on the Wind
39.description: Alcoholic playboy Kyle Hadley marries the woman secretly loved by his poor but hard-working best friend, who in turn is pursued by Kyle's nymphomaniac sister.

40.name: Bus Stop
40.description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

41.name: Alexander the Great
41.description: The life and military conquests of Alexander III of Macedon (July 20/21, 356 - June 10/11, 323 B.C.), commonly known as Alexander the Great.

42.name: Earth vs. the Flying Saucers
42.description: Extraterrestrials traveling in high-tech flying saucers contact a scientist as part of a plan to enslave the inhabitants of Earth.

43.name: Sora no daikaijû Radon
43.description: A large mining accident sets loose prehistoric Insects and giant pterosaur's on Japan.

44.name: Private's Progress
44.description: In World War II, a failed British Officer is selected by his uncle, a Brigadier with the War Office, to participate in a secret operation to "recover" looted artworks from the Nazis.

45.name: Godzilla, King of the Monsters!
45.description: A 400-foot (122-meter) dinosaur-like beast, awoken from undersea hibernation off the Japanese coast by atomic-bomb testing, attacks Tokyo.

46.name: Trapeze
46.description: A crippled circus acrobat is torn emotionally between two ambitious young trapeze artists, one a talented young American and a less-gifted but beautiful Italian.

47.name: The Fastest Gun Alive
47.description: In the western frontier town of Cross Creek storekeeper George Temple is a polite and soft spoken man with a secret past.When three bank robbers on the lam stop in town to change horses George Temple's past comes back to haunt him.

48.name: Attack
48.description: In 1945, an American Infantry company sets up an artillery observation post but tensions between Captain Cooney and Lieutenant Costa run high.

49.name: Bob le flambeur
49.description: After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.

50.name: The Swan
50.description: Princess Beatrice's days of enjoying the regal life are numbered unless her only daughter, Princess Alexandra, makes a good impression on a distant cousin when he pays a surprise visit to ...                See full summary »
